name: Radhe
summary_text: After taking the dreaded gangster Gani Bhai, ACP Rajveer Shikawat aka Radhe goes on a manhunt to find the wealthiest man of the town secretly running a crime syndicate.

name: Aspirants
summary_text: It is the story of the journey of three UPSC (public service competitive exams in India) aspirants and their friendship against all odds.

name: Godzilla vs. Kong
summary_text: The epic next chapter in the cinematic Monsterverse pits two of the greatest icons in motion picture history against one another - the fearsome Godzilla and the mighty Kong - with humanity caught in the balance.

name: Sardar Ka Grandson
summary_text: A devoted grandson embarks on a complicated and comic journey to fulfill his ailing grandmother's last wish.

name: Karnan
summary_text: Karnan, a fearless village youth, must fight for the rights of the conservative people of his village, due to the torture given by a police officer.

name: The Last Hour
summary_text: A mysterious young shaman, on the run protecting a secret gift, joins hands with a seasoned city cop to hunt down a dangerous figure from his dark past. But when he falls for the cop's young daughter, he is torn between duty and love.

name: The Family Man
summary_text: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

name: Soorarai Pottru
summary_text: Nedumaaran Rajangam "Maara" sets out to make the common man fly and in the process takes on the world's most capital intensive industry and several enemies who stand in his way.

name: Scam 1992: The Harshad Mehta Story
summary_text: Set in 1980's and 90's Bombay, it follows the life of Harshad Mehta, a stockbroker who took the stock market to dizzying heights and his catastrophic downfall.

name: The Trial of the Chicago 7
summary_text: The story of 7 people on trial stemming from various charges surrounding the uprising at the 1968 Democratic National Convention in Chicago, Illinois.

April 6th, 1917. As a regiment assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

name: Ready Player One
summary_text: When the creator of a virtual reality called the OASIS dies, he makes a posthumous challenge to all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will give the finder his fortune and control of his world.

name: Nayattu
summary_text: Three police officers who are on a run for life, escaping the outbreak against them due to the unlawful arrest and torture of a civilian. It brings in a few shades of arrogant yet very much human police officers and their helplessness.

name: Sandeep Aur Pinky Faraar
summary_text: A story of a man and woman who represent two completely different Indias. They are united in one thing only. Their mistrust, suspicion, and hate for each other.

name: Peter Rabbit 2: The Runaway
summary_text: Thomas and Bea are now married and living with Peter and his rabbit family. Bored of life in the garden, Peter goes to the big city, where he meets shady characters and ends up creating chaos for the whole family.

name: November Story
summary_text: A celebrated crime novelist suffering from Alzheimer's is found at a murder scene with no memory of what happened. Now, it is up to his daughter to save him.

name: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
summary_text: Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.

name: Dredd
summary_text: In a violent, futuristic city where the police have the authority to act as judge, jury and executioner, a cop teams with a trainee to take down a gang that deals the reality-altering drug, SLO-MO.

name: Kota Factory
summary_text: Dedicated to Shrimati SL Loney ji, Shri Irodov ji and Maanniya HC Verma ji, 'Kota Factory' is TVF's latest original. India's first 'Black and White' show highlights the problems present day IIT-JEE aspirants face in their day-to-day lives.

name: Cinema Bandi
summary_text: When a driver finds an expensive camera in the back seat of his rickshaw, he comes up with a ridiculously ambitious plan to gather the village and make a film - a ticket to get their drought-hit village out of its dreary conditions.

name: The Girl on the Train
summary_text: A divorcee becomes entangled in a missing persons investigation that promises to send shockwaves throughout her life.

name: 3 Idiots
summary_text: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

name: The White Tiger
summary_text: An ambitious Indian driver uses his wit and cunning to escape from poverty and rise to the top. An epic journey based on the New York Times bestseller.

name: Alma Matters - Inside the IIT Dream
summary_text: In a "nation of middle-class" the IIT dream involves clearing the world's toughest public exam for guaranteed lifelong success. Life is not an exam though. It's a hustle, one that nobody trains them for. The result? Eternal tumult.

name: 99 Songs
summary_text: Challenged to compose 100 songs before he can marry the girl he loves, a tortured but passionate singer-songwriter embarks on a poignant musical journey.

name: Operation Java
summary_text: The story revolves around a group of officers and a series of mysteries, events and cases reported before them in the Cyber Cell. It is also about how they plan and execute their operations.

name: Cowboys & Aliens
summary_text: A spaceship arrives in Arizona, 1873, to take over the Earth, starting with the Wild West region. A posse of cowboys and natives are all that stand in their way.

name: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
summary_text: An Indian man with a magnanimous heart takes a young mute Pakistani girl back to her homeland to reunite her with her family.

name: Lion
summary_text: A five-year-old Indian boy is adopted by an Australian couple after getting lost hundreds of kilometers from home. 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.

name: The Foreigner
summary_text: A humble businessman with a buried past seeks justice when his daughter is killed in an act of terrorism. A cat-and-mouse conflict ensues with a government official, whose past may hold clues to the killers' identities.

name: Panchayat
summary_text: A comedy-drama, which captures the journey of an engineering graduate Abhishek, who for lack of a better job option joins as secretary of a Panchayat office in a remote village of Uttar Pradesh.

name: Lincoln
summary_text: As the American Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves.

name: Asuran
summary_text: The teenage son of a farmer from an underprivileged caste kills a rich, upper caste landlord. Will the farmer, a loving father and a pacifist by heart, be able to save his hot-blooded son is the rest of the story.

name: Master
summary_text: An alcoholic professor is sent to a juvenile school, where he clashes with a gangster who uses the school children for criminal activities.

name: TVF Pitchers
summary_text: A story of trials and tribulations of four young entrepreneurs who quit their day jobs in order to pursue their start up venture.

name: Bridge of Spies
summary_text: During the Cold War, an American lawyer is recruited to defend an arrested Soviet spy in court, and then help the CIA facilitate an exchange of the spy for the Soviet captured American U2 spy plane pilot, Francis Gary Powers.

name: Life of Pi
summary_text: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

name: Conan the Barbarian
summary_text: A vengeful barbarian warrior sets off to get his revenge on the evil warlord who attacked his village and murdered his father when he was a boy.

name: Sacred Games
summary_text: A link in their pasts leads an honest cop to a fugitive gang boss, whose cryptic warning spurs the officer on a quest to save Mumbai from cataclysm.

name: Race 3
summary_text: Relationships and loyalties of a criminal family planning its next big heist are tested when some shocking revelations strike them.

name: Tumbbad
summary_text: A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around the consequences when humans build a temple for her first-born.

name: Kala
summary_text: A psychological thriller that revolves around Shaji who faces an intriguing conflict with the many layered shades of human behavior.

name: Pariyerum Perumal
summary_text: A law student from a lower caste begins a friendship with his classmate, a girl who belongs to a higher caste, and the men in her family start giving him trouble over this.

name: Asur: Welcome to Your Dark Side
summary_text: A unique crime thriller that pits two opposing worlds against each other. The less explored, intricate world of forensic science and the deep mysticism of ancient Indian Mythology.

name: The Happening
summary_text: A science teacher, his wife, and a young girl struggle to survive a plague that causes those infected to commit suicide.

name: Mumbai Saga
summary_text: The plot of the movie is set in the era of the 80s and 90s which were marked as a transformed period of Mumbai.

name: The Darjeeling Limited
summary_text: A year after their father's funeral, three brothers travel across India by train in an attempt to bond with each other.

name: Grand Theft Auto V
summary_text: Three very different criminals team up for a series of heists in the corrupt city of Los Santos.

name: Ajeeb Daastaans
summary_text: Four shorts explore the surprising ways in which unexpected catalysts inflame the uncomfortable emotions simmering under fractured relationships.

name: Ghost in the Shell
summary_text: In the near future, Major Mira Killian is the first of her kind: A human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals.

name: Flames
summary_text: A teenage romance from The Timeliners that aims straight from the heart. This web-series is the story of a young romance unfolding as a chemical reaction.

name: Red Dead Redemption II
summary_text: Amidst the decline of the Wild West at the turn of the 19th century, outlaw Arthur Morgan and his gang struggle to cope with the loss of their way of life.

name: Poove Unakkaga
summary_text: When a man realizes that the Hindu woman he loves is in love with a Christian man, he decides to sacrifice his love and unite their families so as to make the love story a success.

name: Paatal Lok
summary_text: A down and out cop lands the case of a lifetime when four suspects are nabbed in the assassination attempt of a journalist. The pursuit of it leads him to 'Paatal Lok', and to shocking discoveries in the past of the four suspects.

name: Mirzapur
summary_text: A shocking incident at a wedding procession ignites a series of events entangling the lives of two families in the lawless city of Mirzapur.

name: Real Steel
summary_text: In the near future, robot boxing is a top sport. A struggling ex-boxer feels he's found a champion in a discarded robot.

name: Skater Girl
summary_text: When a teen in rural India discovers a life-changing passion for skateboarding, she faces a rough road as she follows her dream to compete.

name: Ramprasad Ki Tehrvi
summary_text: Bauji's entire family comes under one roof for 13 days after he passes away. We get a glimpse of their dynamics, politics and insecurities as each one of them is on their journey to discover their own selves and truth.

name: Thuppakki
summary_text: An army captain is on a mission to track down and destroy a terrorist gang and deactivate the sleeper cells under its command.

name: Joji
summary_text: Joji, an engineering dropout and the youngest son of a rich family lives with his aspirations of becoming super wealthy. Driven by greed and blind ambition, he decides to execute his plans following an unexpected event in the family.

name: Bharat
summary_text: At the cusp of India's birth as an Independent nation, a family makes an arduous journey to freedom at a cost. A young boy Bharat, makes a promise to his Father that he will keep his family together no matter what.

name: Special OPS
summary_text: The story through the eyes of Himmat Singh is based on the inspiration was taken from Nineteen Years of nationally significant events, several espionage missions were undertaken by India in the last two decades.

name: The Priest
summary_text: A priest and a police officer are trying to solve a set of mysterious suicides. As their investigation closes in, they discover another crime with even farther-reaching consequences.

name: Vitthal Teedi
summary_text: Story of a gambler as he journeys from his village to a city.

name: The Fall
summary_text: In a hospital on the outskirts of 1920s Los Angeles, an injured stuntman begins to tell a fellow patient, a little girl with a broken arm, a fantastic story of five mythical heroes. Thanks to his fractured state of mind and her vivid imagination, the line between fiction and reality blurs as the tale advances.

name: Ahaan
summary_text: Jilted by his wife, a man with OCD finds eye opening common ground and camaraderie with his neighbor, a young man with Down Syndrome.

name: Mandela
summary_text: A local barber's fate turns overnight when he becomes the single deciding vote in the village elections.

name: Need for Speed
summary_text: Fresh from prison, a street racer who was framed by a wealthy business associate joins a cross-country race with revenge in mind. His ex-partner, learning of the plan, places a massive bounty on his head as the race begins.

name: Gangs of Wasseypur
summary_text: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

name: Andhadhun
summary_text: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

name: Wanted
summary_text: Radhe is a ruthless gangster who will kill anyone for money. He is attracted towards Jhanvi, a middle class girl, who does not approve of his work and wants him to change.

name: Pagglait
summary_text: Widowed soon after marriage, a young woman grapples with an inability to grieve, quirky relatives and a startling discovery about her late husband.

name: The Turning
summary_text: A young governess is hired to look after an orphaned girl, but the return of the girl's problematic brother uncovers secrets from their past. A modern take on Henry James' novella "The Turn of the Screw."

name: Sadak 2
summary_text: The film picks up where Sadak left off, revolving around the journey with a young girl who becomes an important character in the life of the protagonist, and the reason for him to stay alive.

name: Nizhal
summary_text: John Baby, who is recouping from a traumatic accident, meets Nitin, a young boy who interests him with murder stories. When Baby explores the possibility of Nitin's stories by mapping the events, it matches with the real-time incidents.

name: Pather Panchali
summary_text: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.

name: Mersal
summary_text: A magician and a doctor attempt to expose the corruption at the heart of India's medical industry.

name: Like Stars on Earth
summary_text: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

name: Dangal
summary_text: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

name: The Great Indian Kitchen
summary_text: After marriage, a woman struggles to be the submissive wife that her husband and his family expect her to be. The story follows her journey, as she changes herself and, even more so, changes the household.

name: Raatchasan
summary_text: A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.

name: Ludo
summary_text: From a resurfaced sex tape to a rogue suitcase of money, four wildly different stories overlap at the whims of fate, chance and one eccentric criminal.

name: The Disciple
summary_text: Self-doubt, sacrifice and struggle converge into an existential crisis for a devoted classical vocalist as the mastery he strives for remains elusive.

name: Aarkkariyam
summary_text: Shirley and Roy in the middle of an impending Covid lock-down and a personal financial crisis, leave their Mumbai home for Shirley's home in Pala where her father Ittyavira stays. Roy soon finds that her home is not what he thought it is.

name: D Company
summary_text: The biggest saga of the year is about to unfold the dark side of India's underworld enterprise. The film will showcase the true story behind India's biggest underworld enterprise, D Company...                See full summary »

name: Kaththi
summary_text: Jeevanandham is a social activist who fights against a monstrous MNC company to restore farming. Because of destiny, Kathiresan impersonates Jeevanandham and leads the war.

name: I Am Number Four
summary_text: Aliens and their Guardians are hiding on Earth from intergalactic bounty hunters. They can only be killed in numerical order, and Number Four is next on the list. This is his story.

name: Milestone
summary_text: Recently marking 500,000 kilometers on the road, a newly bereaved trucker faces the threat of losing the job that has come to define him to a new intern.

name: Dabangg 3
summary_text: Chulbul Pandey encounters an enemy from his past, and his origin story as the fearless cop unfolds.

name: PK
summary_text: An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship. His innocent nature and child-like questions force the country to evaluate the impact of religion on its people.

name: Criminal Justice
summary_text: Sex, drugs and a gruesome murder. An edgy one night stand turns into a nightmare for Aditya, when he wakes up with blood on his hands. The evidence is stacked against him, but he doesn't remember the grisly crime. Is he guilty or not ?

name: Gandhi
summary_text: The life of the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of nonviolent protest.

name: Saina
summary_text: The story of Saina Nehwal, a professional badminton player who ranked number 1 in the sport.

name: Kaithi
summary_text: Dilli, an ex-convict, endeavours to meet his daughter for the first time after leaving prison. However, his attempts are interrupted due to a drug raid planned by Inspector Bejoy.

name: Hotel Mumbai
summary_text: The true story of the Taj Hotel terrorist attack in Mumbai. Hotel staff risk their lives to keep everyone safe as people make unthinkable sacrifices to protect themselves and their families.

name: Vada Chennai
summary_text: A young carrom player in north Chennai becomes a reluctant participant in a war between two warring gangsters.

name: Cubicles
summary_text: Follows the chronicles of Piyush, a typical first jobber & the people around him.

name: JL50
summary_text: A plane is discovered to have recently crashed in West Bengal. However, what is so baffling about the incident is that plane originally went missing 35 years ago.

name: The BFG
summary_text: An orphan little girl befriends a benevolent giant who takes her to Giant Country, where they attempt to stop the man-eating giants that are invading the human world.

name: War Horse
summary_text: Young Albert enlists to serve in World War I after his beloved horse is sold to the cavalry. Albert's hopeful journey takes him out of England and to the front lines as the war rages on.

name: The Hundred-Foot Journey
summary_text: The Kadam family leaves India for France where they open a restaurant directly across the road from Madame Mallory's Michelin-starred eatery.

name: Runaway Lugai
summary_text: Rajnikant Sinha is a submissive man who has lived his entire life under his father's thumb as a pawn. His life took a turn for the better when Rajni met and married Bulbul. However, Bulbul made a bold decision to run away without a trace.

name: Drishyam 2
summary_text: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Georgekutty be able to protect his family this time?

name: Drishyam
summary_text: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

name: Out of Love
summary_text: Meera(Rasika) begins to suspect every female associate of Akarsh(Purab), her husband after she found a stray hair which is not hers. After discussing with her friend, she thought she might ...                See full summary »

name: Sultan
summary_text: Sultan is a classic underdog tale about a wrestler's journey, looking for a comeback by defeating all odds.

name: Bigil
summary_text: A former football player struggles to train a women's football team and avenge his father's death.

name: Kathmandu Connection
summary_text: An officer is murdered, a hotelier is kidnapped, and a reporter is stalked against the backdrop of the 1993 Mumbai Blast.

name: Vikram Vedha
summary_text: Vikram, a no-nonsense police officer, accompanied by Simon, his partner, is on the hunt to capture Vedha, a smuggler and a murderer. Vedha tries to change Vikram's life, which leads to a conflict.

name: Dabangg
summary_text: A corrupt police officer faces challenges from his family, gangsters and politicians.

name: The Way Back
summary_text: Siberian gulag escapees travel four thousand miles by foot to freedom in India.

name: Dil Bechara
summary_text: The emotional journey of two hopelessly in love youngsters, a young girl, Kizie, suffering from cancer, and a boy, Manny, whom she meets at a support group.

name: Kaagaz
summary_text: A satirical comedy about a common man and the struggle he goes through to prove his existence after being falsely being declared dead on government records.

name: The House with a Clock in Its Walls
summary_text: A young orphan named Lewis Barnavelt aids his magical uncle in locating a clock with the power to bring about the end of the world.

name: The Girl on the Train
summary_text: The story follows a recent divorcee who spends her daily commute fantasizing about a seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes daily, but something shocking happens there one day.

name: Delhi Crime
summary_text: Based on the Nirbhaya case, Delhi Crime follows the Delhi Police investigation into the finding of the men who perpetrated this crime.

name: Sarkar
summary_text: An NRI businessman learns his vote has been cast by someone else and decides to investigate the matter, eventually finding himself pitted against two corrupt politicians.

name: Super Deluxe
summary_text: An unfaithful newly-wed wife, an estranged father, a priest and an angry son suddenly find themselves in the most unexpected predicaments, each poised to experience their destiny, all on one fateful day.

name: The Married Woman
summary_text: A wife, a mom, a teacher, a homemaker, she's played all the roles, but what about being true to herself? Being Astha? Be a part of Astha's journey as she breaks boundaries, set by society, to find herself.

name: A Dog's Journey
summary_text: A dog finds the meaning of his own existence through the lives of the humans he meets.

name: A Dog's Purpose
summary_text: A dog looks to discover his purpose in life over the course of several lifetimes and owners.

name: Tiger Zinda Hai
summary_text: When a group of Indian and Pakistani nurses are held hostage in Iraq by a terrorist organization, a secret agent is drawn out of hiding to rescue them.

name: Forensic
summary_text: Samuel uses his forensic skills and discovers breakthroughs in a serial killing case as further victims are added to the list. Shikha teams up with Samuel and uncovers evidence that might lead to the killer's identity.

name: Ghilli
summary_text: Velu, an aspiring kabaddi player, goes to Madurai to participate in a regional match, where he rescues Dhanalakshmi from Muthupandi, a powerful man keen on marrying the girl against her will.

name: Puppy Dog Pals
summary_text: Fun-loving pug puppies, brothers Bingo and Rolly, have thrill-seeking appetites that take them on exhilarating adventures in their neighborhood and around the globe.

name: Zero
summary_text: The story revolves around Bauua Singh (Shah Rukh Khan), a vertically challenged man, who is full of charm and wit, with a pinch of arrogance. Born to a wealthy family and raised in an environment of affluence, he is challenged to broaden his horizon and find purpose in life.

name: Aarya
summary_text: When her world suddenly turns upside down, will Aarya become the very thing she hated?How far will she go to survive and protect her family?

name: Delivery Man
summary_text: An affable underachiever finds out he's fathered 533 children through anonymous donations to a fertility clinic 20 years ago. Now he must decide whether or not to come forward when 142 of them file a lawsuit to reveal his identity.

name: The Light Between Oceans
summary_text: A lighthouse keeper and his wife living off the coast of Western Australia raise a baby they rescue from a drifting rowing boat.

name: Silence: Can You Hear It
summary_text: When everyone is hiding the truth, justice will thrive despite the silence. Prepare for a murder mystery that will keep you guessing till the end.

name: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
summary_text: While recovering from an assassination attempt four days before his coronation, a stern prince is replaced by a romantic lookalike.

name: Devdas
summary_text: After his wealthy family prohibits him from marrying the woman he is in love with, Devdas Mukherjee's life spirals further and further out of control as he takes up alcohol and a life of vice to numb the pain.

name: Breathe: Into the Shadows
summary_text: "A father's love can save a life... or take one," sets the tone for a dark and gritty series.

name: Roohi
summary_text: Janhvi Kapoor has begun shooting for the horror-comedy Roohi Afza, in which she stars alongside Rajkummar Rao and Varun Sharma.

name: Vasantha Vaasal
summary_text: Vijay and Divya have different ambitions in life. While he aspires to become an actor, she hates acting career and wants to excel in academics. He also discovers that her uncle is forcing her to act.

name: Gullak
summary_text: Set in quaint by-lanes in the heart of India, Gullak is a collection of disarming and relatable tales of the Mishra family.

name: I Am Alone, So Are You...
summary_text: A homosexual boy. A lesbian girl. A road trip from New Delhi to Himachal which helps them discover the Love in friendship.

name: Nail Polish
summary_text: Nail Polish, written and directed by Bugs Bhargava Krishna, stars Arjun Rampal, Manav Kaul, Anand Tiwari and Rajit Kapur. It's a legal thriller that explores the uncertainty of the human mind.

name: Wild Dog
summary_text: A Dramatic presentation of August 2007 Hyderabad bombings and its investigations told through NIA point of view.

name: TVF Tripling
summary_text: Divorced, jobless, hopeless. Three siblings plan a road trip together. Chandan, Chanchal & Chitvan. Together they start a hilarious journey, to find themselves and their relations..

name: Sultan
summary_text: A man raised by gangsters tries to reform them, and a hired job to protect a village presents him with the perfect opportunity.

name: Raat Akeli Hai
summary_text: The film follows a small town cop who is summoned to investigate the death of a politician which gets complicated by the victim's secretive family and his own conflicted heart.

name: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
summary_text: Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their friends gets engaged.

name: Hostel Daze
summary_text: Through the adventures of four friends 'Hostel Daze' captures what goes inside an engineering hostel in India.

name: Biriyaani
summary_text: The movie chronicles the life of Khadeeja, a married Muslim woman confined within the four walls of the household, forced to conceal her desires in the name of religious and societal norms.

name: My Name Is Khan
summary_text: An Indian Muslim man with Asperger's syndrome takes a challenge to speak to the President of the United States seriously and embarks on a cross-country journey.

name: Anjaam Pathiraa
summary_text: The police are on the trail of a serial killer, but with the victims being fellow officers, will they be able to catch the killer and solve the case in time?

name: K.G.F: Chapter 1
summary_text: In the 1970s, a fierce rebel rises against brutal oppression and becomes the symbol of hope to legions of downtrodden people.

name: Vakeel Saab
summary_text: Drama film centers on the life of a criminal lawyer.

name: Baahubali: The Beginning
summary_text: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades-old feud between two warring peoples.

name: Laal Singh Chaddha
summary_text: An official remake of the 1994 American film Forrest Gump

name: Theri
summary_text: When his daughter's life is endangered by a local gang, Joseph Kuruvilla will do whatever it takes to stop them. However, at the same time, his dangerous past slowly resurfaces.

name: Irul
summary_text: When a car breakdown forces a couple to seek shelter in a nearby home, conversations with the stranger inside soon suggest there's a killer among them.

name: The Big Bull
summary_text: The story of the film is based on real events of financial market that took place between 1990 and 2000 involving Harshad Mehta and his financial crimes.

name: His Story
summary_text: A rollercoaster tale of a power couple, Kunal-Sakshi who lead a perfect married life since 15 years and are the epitome of perfection that makes their friends red with envy.

name: Gandii Baat
summary_text: Scintillating stories of murder mysteries all under the genre of erotic thriller. With characters bordering on the psychopath tendencies, the stories this season dwell upon the plethora of emotions that prompt crimes of passion.

name: The Man Who Knew Infinity
summary_text: The story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, and his friendship with his mentor, Professor G.H. Hardy.

name: Yeh Meri Family
summary_text: Set in the summer of 1998 it is a story about conflicting emotions towards family members from the eyes of a twelve year old.

name: Tubelight
summary_text: A story of two brothers set during the Sino-Indian war, 1962: the younger one who's at war at the borders and the elder who's at war with his own world.

name: Visaaranai
summary_text: Four labourers are tortured by the police to confess to a theft they have not committed.

name: Bandish Bandits
summary_text: Indian classical singer Radhe and pop star Tamanna. Despite their contrasting personalities, the two "set out together on a journey of self-discovery to see if opposites, though they might attract, can also adapt and go the long haul.

name: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story
summary_text: The untold story of Mahendra Singh Dhoni's journey from ticket collector to trophy collector - the world-cup-winning captain of the Indian Cricket Team.

name: Article 15
summary_text: In the rural heartlands of India, an upright police officer sets out on a crusade against violent caste-based crimes and discrimination.

name: Badla
summary_text: A dynamic young entrepreneur finds herself locked in a hotel room with the corpse of her dead lover. She hires a prestigious lawyer to defend her and they work together to figure out what actually happened.

name: Mickey Mouse Clubhouse
summary_text: Mickey and his friends Minnie, Donald, Pluto, Daisy, Goofy, Pete, Clarabelle and more go on fun and educational adventures.

name: Romantic
summary_text: Add a Plot

name: Swades
summary_text: A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.

name: Inside Edge
summary_text: Inside Edge is the story of the Mumbai Mavericks, a T20 cricket franchise playing in the Powerplay League. Set in a landscape of conflicting interests, where selfishness is almost a virtue, where sex, money, and power are mere means to an end, Inside Edge is a story that pulls no punches, minces no words, and takes no prisoners. Come witness the game behind the game.

name: Permanent Roommates
summary_text: A couple, who were in a long distance relationship for 3 years, face the prospect of getting married.

name: Thulladha Manamum Thullum
summary_text: Kutty wants to become a singer while working in an audio shop run by Mani. His songs are appreciated by a college student Rukmani and each time when she wishes to meet him, circumstances ...                See full summary »

name: Ghajini
summary_text: A short-term memory loss patient sets out on his journey to avenge the death of his beloved girl.

name: Ek Tha Tiger
summary_text: India's top spy Tiger and his love Zoya battle the dark world of intelligence and espionage that forbids its soldiers from loving the enemy.

name: Super 30
summary_text: Based on the life of Patna-based mathematician Anand Kumar who runs the famed Super 30 program for IIT aspirants in Patna.

name: Drishyam
summary_text: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

name: Sir
summary_text: A prosperous young Indian man falls in love with his servant, a widow with the dream of becoming a fashion designer.

name: Bellbottom
summary_text: Get ready to go back to the 80's and hop onto a roller-coaster spy ride, #BELLBOTTOM. Releasing on 28th May, 2021.

name: Broken But Beautiful
summary_text: Agastya&Rumi-two people from very different worlds.Love came looking for them, when they were chasing their personal obsessions. Their journey comes a full circle when they realise that it is to harder to fall out of love, than in it.

name: Malang
summary_text: Advait visits Goa where he meets Sara, a free-spirited girl who lives life unshackled. Opposites attract and all goes well until life turns upside down. Years later, Advait is on a killing spree with cops Aghase and Michael in his way.

name: Undekhi
summary_text: When a dead body is received, locals inform Dibyendu Bhattacharya, who is investigating the case, that the body is at least 2-3 days old. They also find out the body was murdered first and then eaten by animals.

name: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India
summary_text: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.

name: Made in Heaven
summary_text: It is the story of two wedding planners in Delhi, where tradition jostles with modern aspirations against the backdrop of big fat Indian weddings revealing many secrets and lies.

name: Check
summary_text: The story of a prisoner on Death row fighting his wrongful conviction in the backdrop of Chess.

name: Chal Mera Putt 2
summary_text: Friendship and love between illegal immigrants struggling and facing challenges. Showing us that when it comes to the struggle of life, no border can divide human hearts and the love inside.

name: Tere Naam
summary_text: Problems arise when Radhey Mohan, a delinquent falls in love with a girl named Nirjara.

name: Gully Boy
summary_text: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

name: Kushi
summary_text: College friends Jenny and Shiva part ways due to a misunderstanding. Although they are in love and realize they cannot live without each other, their egos prevent them from uniting.

name: Hello Mini
summary_text: A thriller drama series, revolving around Rivanah Bannerjee, an independent girl, living alone in Mumbai. She has the perfect life: doting parents, a loving boyfriend, and a great job. But ...                See full summary »

name: Nerkonda Paarvai
summary_text: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

name: Sura
summary_text: An ordinary fisherman attempts to save his village from a corrupted politician.

name: Jai Ho
summary_text: An upright ex-army man, Jai fights a solitary war against corruption and injustice. With a simple mantra to pay forward, he starts off by helping one person and forms an ever growing circle of people helping each other.

name: Love Today
summary_text: Ganesh is obsessively in love with Sandhya, but she is not interested in him. His relentless pursuit leads to a lot of problems. However, everything changes the day he loses his father in an accident.

name: Dear Zindagi
summary_text: Kaira is a budding cinematographer in search of a perfect life. Her encounter with Jug, an unconventional thinker, helps her gain a new perspective on life. She discovers that happiness is all about finding comfort in life's imperfections.

name: Jilla
summary_text: A looming gangster after witnessing a bone chilling event, stands up against his father's prejudice.

name: A Suitable Boy
summary_text: A vast, panoramic tale charting the fortunes of four large families and exploring India and its rich and varied culture at a crucial point in its history.

name: Radhe Shyam
summary_text: A romantic drama set in Europe during the 1970s.

name: ImMATURE
summary_text: A 5-episode coming-of-age story about the many first adventures in a young man's life. Dhruv is 16, and in a hurry to grow up. With a little help from his school friends, the wannabe ...                See full summary »

name: The Namesake
summary_text: American-born Gogol, the son of Indian immigrants, wants to fit in among his fellow New Yorkers, despite his family's unwillingness to let go of their traditional ways.

name: Joseph
summary_text: The story develops through the life of four retired policemen. It has the tone of a thriller investigation. An issue affecting the life of Joseph, the central character, and his family is being investigated.

name: Play Back
summary_text: Karthik is an investigative crime reporter from 2019, while Sujatha is from 1993. Karthik knows about her difficulties and he tries to change her future by changing the incidents from her past.

name: Mukesh Jasoos
summary_text: A quintessential loser and detective with questionable skills and laughable methods navigates through petty crimes. However, something sinister is brewing.

name: The Jungle Book
summary_text: Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wild animals, and how he becomes king of the jungle.

name: Bodyguard
summary_text: The daughter of a wealthy nobleman secretly falls in love with her bodyguard.
Two high school sweethearts meet at a reunion after 22 years and reminisce about their past.

name: Kick
summary_text: An adrenaline junkie walks away from a whirlwind romance and embraces a new life as a thief, though he soon finds himself pursued by veteran police officer and engaged in a turf war with a local gangster.

name: Chhichhore
summary_text: A tragic incident forces Anirudh, a middle-aged man, to take a trip down memory lane and reminisce his college days along with his friends, who were labelled as losers.

name: Laxmii
summary_text: Aasif visits his wife's parents' house and happens to go to a ground that is supposedly haunted. However, he is soon possessed by the spirit of a transgender who is out for revenge.

name: Rockstar
summary_text: Janardhan Jakhar chases his dreams of becoming a big Rock star, during which he falls in love with Heer.

name: Pokkiri
summary_text: Thamizh is a killer for hire with no ties and who will do any dirty job for money. He has a girlfriend who loves him but also detests his violent nature. But is Thamizh really what he purports to be?

name: Coolie No. 1
summary_text: After being insulted by a rich businessman named Rosario, pandit Jai Kishen teaches him a lesson by getting his daughter married to Raju - a Coolie posing as a millionaire.

name: Pad Man
summary_text: Upon realizing the extent to which women are affected by their menses, a man sets out to create a sanitary pad machine and to provide inexpensive sanitary pads to the women of rural India.

name: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
summary_text: Two overly imaginative pranksters named George and Harold hypnotize their principal into thinking he's a ridiculously enthusiastic, incredibly dimwitted superhero named Captain Underpants.

name: The Lunchbox
summary_text: A mistaken delivery in Mumbai's famously efficient lunchbox delivery system connects a young housewife to an older man in the dusk of his life as they build a fantasy world together through notes in the lunchbox.

name: Bombay Begums
summary_text: Set in contemporary urban India, five women, across generations, wrestle with desire, ethics, personal crises and vulnerabilities to own their ambition.

name: Kadhalukku Mariyadhai
summary_text: Jeevanandhan "Jeeva" (Vijay) is a very rich young man. Although his parents (Sivakumar and Srividhya) want him to settle down, he goes to another city to do his MBA and stays with friends. ...                See full summary »

name: LOL - Hasse Toh Phasse
summary_text: Hosted by Boman Irani and Arshad Warsi 10 of India's most entertaining and diverse comedians compete to keep a straight face while attempting to make their contenders laugh. In this 6-hour ...                See full summary »

name: Theeran Adhigaram Ondru
summary_text: Theeran, a police officer, is entrusted with the task to solve the mystery behind a series of murders. The only clue left behind is that all the murders are committed in the same pattern.

name: Maheshinte Prathikaaram
summary_text: Mahesh, a studio photographer and studio owner gets into a fight and loses. He ends up taking revenge which leads to certain realizations in his life.

name: Nenjam Marappathillai
summary_text: A god-fearing young woman who takes up the job of a caretaker in a rich household tries to take revenge on her lustful employer.

name: OK Computer
summary_text: In a New India - of towering smart holograms and drone superhighways - hard-boiled Cyber Crime detective Saajan Kundu is called out of retirement when a self-driving taxi is hacked and ordered to kill an anonymous human victim.

name: Kumbalangi Nights
summary_text: The film revolves around four brothers who share a love-hate relationship with each other. Their relationship progresses to another level when Saji, Boney, and Franky decide to help Bobby stand by his love.

name: Talvar
summary_text: An experienced investigator confronts several conflicting theories about the perpetrators of a violent double homicide.

name: Time to Dance
summary_text: The plot revolves around the life of a dancer girl. She meets and falls in love with a youngster. Their life revolves around dance. Things take a new turn as unexpected events happen in their life.
A scientist invents a time machine, which leads to a bitter battle between his evil twin brother and his son.

name: Thondi Muthalum Driksakshiyum
summary_text: Prasad and Sreeja enter wedlock and move to a new place to continue the rest of their lives. Unfortunate events begin to take place after Prasad, a small-time thief, robs Sreeja's gold chain during a bus journey.

name: Thadam
summary_text: The murder of a youngster creates confusion among cops when they discover the suspect has a lookalike.

name: Mohan Kumar Fans
summary_text: Mohan Kumar is an ex-superstar, and Krishnan Unni is his greatest fan who is also his driver. It depicts the lengths that Krishnan Unni, Mohan Kumar's friends and family goes to, to keep Mohan Kumar happy no matter what it takes.

name: Bulbbul
summary_text: A man returns home after years to find his brother's child bride now grown up and abandoned, and his ancestral village plagued by mysterious deaths.

name: Stree
summary_text: In the small town of Chanderi, the menfolk live in fear of an evil spirit named "Stree" who abducts men in the night. Based on the urban legend of "Nale Ba" that went viral in Karnataka in the 1990s.

name: Masaan
summary_text: Along India's Ganges River, four people face prejudice, a strict moral code and a punishing caste system as they confront personal tragedies.

name: Bangalore Days
summary_text: A fun roller coaster ride about three young people, Aju, Divya and Kuttan who are cousins, reach Bangalore to dream, discover and explore.

name: Nanban
summary_text: 10 years after finishing college, two best friends and their enemy go on a search for their third friend, while finding out some truths along the way.

name: Lootcase
summary_text: Nandan Kumar comes across a suitcase and discovers it is full of cash. He takes the suitcase and soon finds himself being chased by a notorious gangster, an honest cop and a minister, who want the suitcase at any cost.

name: Pink
summary_text: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

name: War
summary_text: An Indian soldier chases after his mentor who has gone rogue following an unexpected kill.

name: Thugs of Hindostan
summary_text: Recruited by the East India Company, a local thug infiltrates a troop of patriotic bandits who plan to overthrow the British regime and reclaim their independence.

name: The Fifth Estate
summary_text: A dramatic thriller based on real events that reveals the quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power that turned an Internet upstart into the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization.

name: Baaghi 3
summary_text: A man embarks on a bloody rampage to save his kidnapped brother.

name: Hera Pheri
summary_text: Three unemployed men look for answers to all their money problems - but when their opportunity arrives, will they know what to do with it?

name: Koi Jaane Na
summary_text: A heartbroken writer struggling with writer's block goes to a quiet hill station where he finds love again but uncovers a copycat serial killer who has mysteriously come alive and is killing everyone around him.

name: Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya
summary_text: Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya is an authentic humorous investigative thriller revolving around the adventures of a detective based out of Nellore.

name: The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
summary_text: As the Best Exotic Marigold Hotel has only a single remaining vacancy, posing a rooming predicament for two fresh arrivals, Sonny Kapoor (Dev Patel) pursues his expansionist dream of opening a second hotel.

name: Switzerland
summary_text: A middle-class family tries to save enough money to travel to Switzerland.

name: The Reluctant Fundamentalist
summary_text: A young Pakistani man is chasing corporate success on Wall Street. He finds himself embroiled in a conflict between his American Dream, a hostage crisis, and the enduring call of his family's homeland.

name: B.A. Pass 3
summary_text: BA Pass 3 narrates the story of a jobless Anshul and how his life changes upside down when he meets a married woman and gets into a relationship with her.

name: Mai Hero Boll Raha Hu
summary_text: Nawab rises as an underworld don from a small town boy to Bombay's most powerful don. He falls in love with actress Laila who isn't aware of who he is. His erstwhile mentor Lala turns against him. Will Nawab and Laila survive?

name: Tandav
summary_text: Tandav is a story that happens in the capital city of the world's largest democracy - DILLI (New Delhi), where it takes you inside the closed, chaotic doors of power and manipulation and uncover the darkest lanes of Indian politics.

name: Bullet to the Head
summary_text: After watching their respective partners die, a New Orleans hitman and a Washington, D.C. detective form an alliance in order to bring down their common enemy.

name: Ugly
summary_text: The case of a missing girl takes us through a journey of human greed and brushes upon the egos and repressed emotions of the characters.

name: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion
summary_text: When Shiva, the son of Bahubali, learns about his heritage, he begins to look for answers. His story is juxtaposed with past events that unfolded in the Mahishmati Kingdom.

name: Hello Charlie
summary_text: Charlie a young pizza delivery boy, who has been assigned the task to transport a gorilla from Mumbai to Diu. The adventures the unlikely duo get embroiled in along the way forms the crux of the plot.
